text: QO Yurcee May 2024 i'd go with Ð° fresh index STEPS: quit Obsidian go to: C:\Users<username>\AppData\Roaming\obsidian (or similar folder if you are on mac or linux) remove these folders: Cache Code Cache DawnCache GPUCache IndexedDB Storage restart Obsidian, let it index afresh maybe try deactivating dataview and omnisearch or any other plugin that do indexing on startup (if installed and enabled) in fact, always activate any plugins after the indexing is done...
